tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The Doctor spends enough time with each patient, listens to your symptoms, asks the right questions & then shares his diagnosis. Also, doesn't prescribe heavy medication, antibiotics till its absolutely necessary. His staff is extremely helpful, responsive as well. Would highly recommend Dr Shivaram as a GP.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Consulted the doctor via call, as the patient was hesitant to visit any doc. Doctor gave good advices amd explained in detail about the problems of the health. Doc responded in a very polite way, thank tou so much Dr. Shivram.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good and Great experience with the doctor .Gave appropriate treatment and medication. I recommend other to please visit without worried about anything .Doctor is very friendly and listen your concern and suggest good medication based on your severity.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have consulted Dr. Shivaram for health issue, he has always been patient and gave enough time to listen to the issue and suggest necessary medications. He has made himself available at anytime to clarify and resolve the queries and concerns even during his busy schedules. He is a very kind, empathetic *** ************* ****** *** a wonderful human. He puts me at ease and makes me smile which is a great medicine itself. Although, I am still being treated, I am sure I can recover soon as the Doctor always encourages me to get better and push myself forward. He has saved my life and will forever be indebted to him. Thanks a ton Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
exremely casual approach. The appointment was booked for 9:15 and at 9:13 i get a message from him that i will have to wait for 20 mins. I send him all the issues in the meantime along with the details of the medicines I was prescribed by the practitioner i consulted a day before. He cam online just told his diagnosis and said he will send a prescription and disconnected!

I wanted to tell him the fever situation (which i forgot to send as texts before he came on call) but wasn't even able to call back.

I then texted that as well to him. The medicines he gave did not work and i had to suffer through the extreme throat pain throughout the night.  The next day I again booked another appointment with an ENT ******** ****** ******* *** *** *** ** ********* *** ****** ** *** ***** ** ****** ** **** ****** **** **** ******* ***** ******* **** **** ************ *** *** **** *** ******* ** ** *** * ****** **** *** ***** ** ** ****

Visited the doctor for annual health checkup consultation and he explained the concerned issue well and  suggested to do new blood check up for few indicators to see if the previous report were inaccurate and said after the report comes I can contact him and he would suggest  medication if needed but the Staff did not connect me to the doctor after receiving the blood report despite calling twice and avoided me saying thier are other patients waiting. Kind of rude and impolite behaviour from the Staff even after speaking kindly and waiting patiently for the response.

I was given the appointment for 01:45pm and I reached before time with my family. At reception, staff told me to wait and I am in the queue after 2 patients. I waited till 0215pm and staff was eager to send 2 more patients in addition to 2 patients. When I asked, she was not able to help me and were making the things. I had to leave after waiting for 30min without consultation since I had another plan. Staff needs to be more active, should give true information so patients can manage their own schedule accordingly and refrain from unwanted waiting time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Shivaram was very professional, On-time and helpful. Even as I was skeptical about tele consultation, the doctor's approach infused confidence. He asked detailed questions to completely understand the issue and then made accurate diagnosis. We consulted for pain on the right side of the Chest for my 72 year old father. Doctor very patiently heard us and recommended tests and prescribed medicines which brought relief the very next day. My heartfelt thank you for consulting even on a weekend during this terrible pandemic time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ******** ** ** * **** **** ********** He has a kind heart and listens to Patient‚Äôs medical issue very patiently. I had seen him on 28th Dec suspecting Covid and he provided me all the necessary information and comfort needed. Since than he had been keeping a close eye on my medical condition and have advised medication as necessary on timely basis. Sometimes he has taken my calls even as late as 11pm in the night also. I would say , we are very fortunate to have a good doctor in our neighborhood in JP Nagar 7 phase. Thank You Doctor and Take Care !! God bless you.....üòä

review:
Dr. Shivaram gives enough time in listening to the patient‚Äôs problems completely and then very calmly explains the issue, reason behind and also suggests the medication accordingly. 
All our interaction with Dr. Shivaram was only online via Practo and for us it was no different than visiting the clinic experience. I have only seen him being so calm all the time and any time of the day you call. It‚Äôs generally not the case with every doctor.
Thanks doctor for all the kindness and making patients less tensed during this time of pandemic and making to understand the real issue. 
All his medications have worked rightly the first time for us and we are extremely happy about it. Thanks to our instincts to have chosen  Dr. Shivaram amongst the hundreds of suggestions of doctors by Practo.

2. The Doctor patiently asks you the relevant questions to understand your health situation/condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been consulting Dr Sivaram from past 5 years for any sort of medical treatment. ** ** ********* ************* * friendly and patient in explaining the medical conditions. More than anything he boost the confidence and every time we come out after consultation we come out fear and worries free. 

Recent time he treated our entire family for Covid who are in a different location, he was very approachable , supportive and helped us coming out of the situation. He is very detail oriented , one of the reports he was suspecting it‚Äôs wrong and asked to redo the test and he was right about the earlier report.

We are very thankful for his availability and support in those tough times and we are glad we found Dr. Sivaram and a no brainier to reach as first person for any sort of medical treatment or advice .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have taken online consultation from Dr. Shivaram for my close family members for Coronavirus. Few of them were critical during second wave, and we weren't able to manage Hospital beds. While other doctors suggested hospitalization even when Beds were not available, Dr. Shivaram assured that he will be able to advise medicines to treat the patient at home and it worked. This helped me develop confidence in Dr. Shivaram and now I always refer him or take his second opinion for my family and friends.

I have previously also visited in 2023 for heavy cough. Immediately, after one dose I was feeling very better so since then I trust the doctor and also he cured food poison for my husband very quickly. I highly recommend him for any health issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,

He seemed like he was in hurry to leave and did not explain the issues I asked about, according to my reports.  He was giving one-word / one-line answers to all the questions asked
Do not recommend going to him if you want to get better understanding of your issues.
Doctor was to-the-point and thorough. Gave appropriate medication and precautions. I am happy with his treatment style.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Shivaram is an amazing doctor who listens to patient fully and patiently and encourages to be open.  He is completely evidence based in his diagnosis and may ask for additional tests if he suspects other ailments or complications.  Once he confirms his diagnosis, his prescriptions are very precise and just what is needed.  He has a fantastic patient communication ethic.  He will respond 100% to every single message throughout the duration of treatment.  He is alert about any side effects and effectiveness of anything in he has prescribed, and advices accordingly if any arise. Based on his assessment of whether your case is an emergency or not his responses are timed. For non emergency cases response may be delayed, but responds 100% even if very late in the night.  He has earned another permanent patient in me and I will trust only Dr Shivaram for the rest of my life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Shivaram had treated me when I was affected with covid. I am thankful that I contacted him, I am now completely recovered. I was suffering mildly from chest pain too, but doctor knew exactly when to administer the steroid tablets. I started recovering better after that. He explained in detail why we are doing what very clearly. During 2nd wave of covid we had many many doubts about medication, tests we had to do, doctor patiently explained us everything. He is a doctor who just doesn't go by books, he analyses the symptoms and treats accordingly. Without a doubt I will reach out to him again and I strongly recommend this doctor.

He changed diabetes medicine but after I got the medicine it was same composition and dosage as was earlier medicine but only brand change. so I don't recommend this doctor ******* ** ***** ***** ***** **** ********** ***** ***** ** ****** ******* *** ****** *******also inspite of booking appointment we had to wait for 45 - 60 mins on both days which is not good in covid times.
